verses.name: Matthew 20:26
verses.text: But it shall not be so among you: but whosoever will be great among you, let him be your minister;

verses.name: Matthew 20:27
verses.text: And whosoever will be chief among you, let him be your servant:

verses.name: Matthew 20:28
verses.text: Even as the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.

verses.name: Matthew 20:29
verses.text: And as they departed from Jericho, a great multitude followed him.

verses.name: Matthew 20:30
verses.text: And, behold, two blind men sitting by the way side, when they heard that Jesus passed by, cried out, saying, Have mercy on us, O Lord, thou Son of David.
